body_html:
The change looks OK to me.
The only improvement I can think of is, we may want to add the copt to set to a config option in configure.py, so --config=mkl_dnn automatically builds with mkl_dnn support.
body_text:
The change looks OK to me.
The only improvement I can think of is, we may want to add the copt to set to a config option in configure.py, so --config=mkl_dnn automatically builds with mkl_dnn support.
body:
The change looks OK to me.
The only improvement I can think of is, we may want to add the copt to set to a config option in configure.py, so `--config=mkl_dnn` automatically builds with mkl_dnn support.
